info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton County through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Lake Pleasant, or 18 miles southwest of Speculator, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Lake Pleasant, Moffitt Beach Campground, Nobleboro, Perkins Clearing, Rudeston, West Canada Lakes, Clockmill Corners, Mountain Home, Sled Harbor, Piseco, Morehouseville, Hoffmeister and Higgins Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
